pull.title: Throw error if CPubKey is invalid during PSBT keypath serialization
pull.body:
Related to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14689

We should catch this error before attempting to deserialize it later.

events.message: Throw error if CPubKey is invalid during PSBT keypath serialization

events.body:
This catches the [downstream issue](
https://github.com/achow101/HWI/pull/47#issuecomment-436590495) I was seeing during the `createfundedpsbt` call rather than during `decodepsbt`.
